title: Social Media Analytics Market to grow at a CAGR of 23.29% from 2022 to 2027, increasing demand for online security to be a key market trend - Technavio
description: NEW YORK, March 13, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- The global social media analytics market size is estimated to grow by USD 7,260.33 million from 2022 to 2027, according to Technavio. The market is estimated to grow at a CAGR of 23.29% during the forecast period.
